questions.question: You are ……………………….. generous woman I have ever met.
questions.description: Here we use most to make the superlative form of beautiful. The is also used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: ……………………………. children love watching cartoons.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ……………………………….. students hate mathematics.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: Who is ………………………………… beautiful girl in the class?
………………………………… of my friends are non-smokers.
questions.description: When most is a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ………………………………… of us wanted him to win.
Which country consumes ……………………………….. meat?
questions.description: When most has a superlative meaning, it is normally used with the.

questions.question: ……………………………. children believe in fairies.
questions.description: When most simply means ‘the majority of’, it is not used with ‘the’.

questions.question: …………………………….. of us want to get rid of corruption.
questions.description: When most simply means ‘the majority of’, it is not used with ‘the’.

questions.question: …………………………… criminals are non-violent.
questions.description: When most is a determiner, it is used without the.

questions.question: She wasn’t as beautiful as the others, but she was …………………………….. intelligent.
questions.description: Here we use most to make the superlative form of beautiful. The is also used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: Thank you for ……………………………….. unforgettable evening.
questions.description: When most means very it is not used with the.
